item.title: Revamp Your Resume Bullets 🚀 • Start with a strong action verb. • Quantify achievements with numbers. • Use: “I increased sales by 30% over 6 months.” • Highlight specific skills or tools used. What specific actions can you quantify in your current role? #resume #career
item.description: Revamp Your Resume Bullets 🚀 • Start with a strong action verb. • Quantify achievements with numbers. • Use: “I increased sales by 30% over 6 months.” • Highlight specific skills or tools used. What specific actions can you quantify in your current role? #resume #career
